Package com.cratediggers.service

Class AlbumServices

java.lang.Object
com.cratediggers.service.AlbumServices
public class AlbumServices
extends java.lang.Object
Handles all business logic for the album module. Follows model-view-controller design architecture by ensuring that the model and view never interact directly.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private AlbumDAO albumDAO
    AlbumDAO object used to interact with the database (the model).
    private ArtistDAO artistDAO
    ArtistDAO object used to interact with the database (the model).
    private GenreDAO genreDAO
    GenreDAO object used to interact with the database (the model).
    private javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request
    Contains parameters received by a HTTP request.
    private javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response
    Used to store attributes that are utilised for JSP generation.

    Constructs an AlbumServices object containing the request and response objects provided by a servlet.

  • Constructor Details

    • AlbumServices

      public AlbumServices​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Constructs an AlbumServices object containing the request and response objects provided by a servlet. Constructs new albumDAO, genreDAO and artistDAO objects used to interact with the database (the model).
      Parameters:
      request - object that contains parameters received in HTTP request made to the server.
      response - object that is used to store attributes which are utilised for JSP generation.

  • Method Details

    • listAlbums

      public void listAlbums() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Provides polymorphism so that listAlbum(String message) can be called without a specified message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • listAlbums

      public void listAlbums​(java.lang.String message) throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Retrieves a list of all albums from database. Forwards the list and a specified message onto "album_list.jsp" to display to users.
      Parameters:
      message - to be displayed at top of JSP page
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • showAlbumNewForm

      public void showAlbumNewForm() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Displays a form ("album_form.jsp") in view for users to create a new album. Lists of all genres and artists are generated and sent in the request object to be displayed as options for the user.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • createAlbum

      public void createAlbum() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Checks if album with given title already exists (title must be unique). If not, generates and displays error message. Otherwise, retrieves all parameters from request object and creates new album object. AlbumDAO creates the record in the database (the model) and displays list of all albums in view.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • readAlbumFields

      public void readAlbumFields​(Album album) throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Parameters:
      album -
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • editAlbum

      public void editAlbum() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Obtains album object that corresponds to the id provided as a parameter in the request object. If album exists then display "album_form.jsp" in the view, setting the album object as an attribute in the response object so that pre-existing album object information can auto-fill in form fields. Lists of all genres and artists are generated and sent in the request object to be displayed as options for the user. If album does not exist then displays error message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • updateAlbum

      public void updateAlbum() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Finds the album objects that currently contains the specified albumId and title. Checks if an album object with the given title exists that contains a different albumId to that which was specified. If this is the case, generates and displays in the view an error message since title must be unique. Otherwise, modifies the object that contains the specified albumId by reading all the form fields stored as parameters in the request object and updates it in the database (the model).
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • deleteAlbum

      public void deleteAlbum() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Obtains album object that corresponds to the id provided as a parameter in the request object. If this album does not exist then an error message is generated and displayed to the user in the view. Otherwise, the corresponding record is deleted in the database (the model) and the user informed by a message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • listAlbumsByGenre

      public void listAlbumsByGenre() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Obtains the genreId provided as a parameter in the request object. Searches the database (the model) for a list of all albums containing the specified genreId as a foreign key. Sets this list and the genre object corresponding to the genreId as attributes of the request object. These are used to generate the "albums_list_by_genre.jsp" page.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • viewAlbumDetail

      public void viewAlbumDetail() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Obtains album object that corresponds to the id provided as a parameter in the request object. These are used to generate the "albums_detail.jsp" page.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • search

      public void search() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Searches database for all albums that contain a given keyword. If no keyword is given then lists all albums available. Uses list of results to generate "search_result.jsp" and display in customer's view.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException
